fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 added 97.70 points or 0.5% to settle at 19,778.30. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, rose 2.09% to 10.46. HDFC Bank, Bajaj Finance and Tata Motors were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The July 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 27 July 2023.
